name: Pokemon Inception
description:
This is a Pokemon fangame made using Unreal Engine that I made as my thesis for graduating high school. It's not quite finished yet and there are still bugs that could cause crashes, but updates will come soon. Please leave your suggestions and thoughts in the comments.

System requirements:

OS: Windows 7 or newer
CPU: 2GHz or more
RAM: 6GB or more
Graphics card: must be compatible with DirectX11 or DirectX12

Also pls don't ban me Nintendo :)
